unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Diving Deep with Follower Analytics!**
normalised: social media and influencer marketing diving deep with follower analytics

unnormalised: Hey everyone! Are you still relying on just likes and shares to gauge your social media performance? It's time to level up, folks! Follower analytics are where the real magic happens, especially if you're trying to build your brand like a Bollywood superstar in the competitive Indian market.
normalised: hey everyone are you still relying on just likes and shares to gauge your social media performance it's time to level up folks follower analytics are where the real magic happens especially if you're trying to build your brand like a bollywood superstar in the competitive indian market

unnormalised: Think about it: knowing WHERE your followers are (are they mostly from Mumbai or Madras?), WHEN they're most active (are they scrolling during their 13:00 hrs lunch break?), and WHAT content resonates with them (do they love your saree haul videos or your tech reviews?) is GOLD.

unnormalised: Services like SocialPilot and even Instagram insights (the free ones!) can help you see this data. For example, maybe your ideal customer is a Gen Z college student who's online after 22:00 hrs. You’d adjust your content plan accordingly, right?

unnormalised: Priya Sharma, a digital marketing guru from IIM Ahmedabad, says, "Understanding follower demographics is crucial. On 26/01/2024, we saw a huge spike in engagement for a client’s Republic Day campaign because we targeted the right audience at the right time.”

unnormalised: So, ditch the guesswork! Start analyzing your followers today and watch your engagement – and maybe even your brand partnerships – skyrocket. Remember what Gandhi ji said on 15/08/1947: "Be the change you want to see in the world" - even if that change is more relevant content!
